title: Colorado mom fatally abused child, gets 16-year prison term - Associated Press
content:
1. Colorado mom fatally abused child, gets 16-year prison term  Associated Press
  2. Colorado mother sentenced to prison for 16 years for 2017 death of 'Make-A-Wish' daughter  CNN
  3. Colorado Mom Kelly Turner Who Abused Her 7-Year-Old Daughter To Death Faces Sentencing  CBS Denver
  4. Colorado mom who portrayed daughter as terminally ill sentenced to 16 years in prison for causing 7-year-old’s death  The Denver Post
  5. Colorado mom who abused 7-year-old daughter to death sentenced to prison  Fox News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: DENVER (AP) — A Colorado mother who fatally abused her 7-year-old daughter and lied about her health to get handouts from charities worth at least $100,000 was sentenced to 16 years in prison as part of a plea deal that threw out murder charges.
